alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 06 at 6:46PM EDT until April 06 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Jefferson County in Big Bend of Florida... Southeastern Thomas County in south central Georgia... Southwestern Brooks County in south central Georgia... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 646 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles southeast of Boston, or 12 miles northeast of Monticello, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Quitman, Blue Springs, Nankin, Grooverville, Ashville and Empress. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for south central Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for south central Georgia.
